nodes.text: Jasis Temm was a male individual who once owned and operated the company Hadlress Defense Systems, Limited on the planet Hadlress. The company was sold for 4.6 billion credits. Temm served as a mechanical engineer and security consultant for Prefect Ilanda and pursued bounty hunting as a career.
Temm was referred to as "Jasis Temmit" in the entry for "Hadlress Defense Systems, Limited" in The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia.
